name: Smart Nano Living - Wien Hauptbahnhof
description: Situated in Vienna, 1.5 km from Vienna Main Railway Station, Smart Nano Living - Wien Hauptbahnhof features accommodation with a garden, free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. The property has garden views and is 2.3 km from Belvedere Palace and 1.5 km from Museum of Military History. This apartment comes with a seating area, a kitchenette with a fridge, and a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. Musikverein is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Karlskirche is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 16 km from Smart Nano Living - Wien Hauptbahnhof.

name: Grand Quarters City Residence
description: Nestled in Vienna, this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom vacation home brings it all within your reach. Fans of nature and the outdoors will love being 12 minutes by foot from Wiener Prater and 15 minutes from Viennese City Park. Your feet will make short work of the 7-minute walk to Hundertwasser House Vienna or the 13-minute walk to Schwedenplatz. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Vienna by hopping on a metro at either Landstrasse U-Bahn, a short 9-minute walk away, or Nestroyplatz U-Bahn, 11 minutes away. While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including an oven and WiFi, as well as a TV and a balcony.VRBO
